title: Clutch Description

body.body: This model is fitted with a hydraulically operated, wet plate, torque assist clutch. The clutch is operated by a hydraulic master cylinder, which in turn operates a slave cylinder mounted on the clutch cover.
The clutch has ten friction plates and nine steel plates located between the inner and outer drums.
